pullRequest.title: [HUDI-1304] Add unit test for testing compaction on replaced file groups
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the pull request
Add unit test to ensure compaction works on top of replaced file groups
Brief change log
Add unit test to ensure compaction works on top of replaced file groups
Verify this pull request

Test only change

Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: Can you add some comments describing the test case scenario. Would be useful for anyone skimming the class.
